text: Hey 🇺🇸 We can either CHOOSE to do this (you know the list: #WearAMask, #StayHome if sick, get the #COVID19 #vaccine, & avoid indoor dining, travel, & indoor gatherings until fully vaccinated), or we can be where they are & facing potential lockdowns again. Which one do we want? https://t.co/NKPd6DLclH
